name: xp-request
description: This class is used to perform XHR requests.
author: ExpandJS <dev@expandjs.com> (http://expandjs.com)

scripts.build: browserify index -i expandjs -i xp-emitter --standalone XPRequest > dist/xp-request.js && npm run build:min
scripts.build:min: browserify -d index -i expandjs -i xp-emitter --standalone XPRequest -p [minifyify --map xp-request.min.map --output dist/xp-request.min.map] > dist/xp-request.min.js
